title: Okwara
author: Okwara
content: Please Be Careful With The Doctors And Hospitals You Visit.According to the Leadership Newspaper, a housewife known as Kehinde, the wife of a Jos based business man Alhaji Kamal had a severe stomach ache in 2018 in the City of Jos, Nigeria. They visited a private hospital owned by Doctor Noah Kekere who diagnosed the woman and said that she had a ruptured appendicitis and must be operated upon immediately.After the operation which took 8 hours, the pain became worse and she continued to visit the same hospital till 2023 when the husband decided to take her to Jos University Teaching Hospital where they discovered that her kidney was removed. He reported to the Police and Doctor Noah was arrested. Currently it is being reported that Doctor Noah has turned to a Lunatic while in custody. Turning to a Lunatic could even be a trick he wants to use to gain freedom. That's my own opinion though. But please we all should be very careful out there and also raise alarm when it's necessary.If Doctor Noah didn't remove the kidney, how come he didn't discover that the woman's kidney had been removed?
